2025-03-31.description: Great spotted woodpecker photographed from the kitchen window. Reminder to myself: I need/want a proper telephoto lens!

2025-03-29.description: Return journey from Italy. Tired, exhausted and little time outside the car. Solution: photograph the mountains out of the car.

2025-03-27.description: Bike tour in Italy on the »Altopiano dei Sette Comuni«, a Plateau in the Italian Alps.

2025-03-25.description: A few minutes before it hailed. The light atmosphere was great. The weather during the hike less so.

2025-03-24.description: First day in italy. First italian photo. Colorful houses, small street, and an italian woman.

2025-03-23.description: New step stool from Edition33, a brand from my great office colleague Max.

2025-03-15.description: The old factory building of BMW (Bayrische Motoren Werke). I always cycle past the building when I have to go to the hardware store - as I did today.

2025-03-14.description: Botanikum Munich. A former nursery with many greenhouses that were used as temporary studios. Unfortunately, they are now being demolished to build (expensive) residential buildings.

2025-03-13.description: Restaurant window sneak-peak. Logo was too cute to just walk past without taking a photo. (Mama Bao in Munich, Maxvorstadt)

2025-03-11.description: Beautiful bicycle from a colleague in front of the office.

2025-03-10.description: I had a packed and busy day. I noticed this door frame and took a photo. That’s my photo for the day — done!

2025-03-09.description: Snapshot late in the evening on the way home from the theater. I had in mind that I was not yet satisfied with the 2-3 photos I had taken so far that day, so I let my photo eye work a little. Although it's a snapshot and the lighting conditions were anything but good for my Ricoh, I'm quite satisfied.

2025-03-08.description: I’m exploring black and white photography through the 365 project. Normally, I pay a lot of attention to the colors in my photos. It’s enjoyable to shift my focus to light, shadows, and composition in the black and white photography.

2025-03-07.description: Golden hour walk by the greenhouses

2025-03-06.description: After work, I had a lunch date in the city and found myself in an area near the train station that I don’t visit often. I decided to take a moment to get off my bike and capture the lively atmosphere and the beautiful light on the street. There’s a lot happening in this photo compared to my typical photography style, but I really like how it conveys the mood in this moment.

2025-03-05.description: Although today was another very sunny, almost spring-like day, I was feeling quite uninspired. Today the view into the late evening sky has to serve as a photo.

2025-03-04.description: Sea of flowers in the Olympic Park

2025-03-03.description: Cycling through the Olympic Park on the way home from work. Wonderful light mood. And photographing the Olympic Tower is always a good idea.

2025-03-02.description: Lazy Sunday photo of our trays in the kitchen

2025-02-23.description: Home project – adjusting and relocating picture frames on the wall. It's a never-ending story.

2025-02-21.description: Construction site I pass by every day on my bike ride to work. I will miss the old buildings once they are fully replaced by the new, uniform ones.

2025-02-18.description: Late afternoon walk at Königsplatz. The light was just perfect.
